DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy YJP-14 capsule treatment endothelial dysfunction patient diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: YJP-14 Capsules Treatment Endothelial Dysfunction Patients With Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose study demonstrate superior effect YJP-14 three dos , 25 , 50 100 mg t.i.d endothelial dysfunction diabetes mellitus indicated mean change difference flow-mediated dilation ( FMD ) , compare placebo group treatment 12 week . The secondary purpose study divide three follow ; - Clinically significant effect YJP-14 three dos , 25 , 50 100 mg t.i.d endothelial dysfunction diabetes mellitus indicated mean change difference FMD , compare placebo group treatment 8 week . - Clinically significant effect YJP-14 three dos , 25 , 50 100 mg t.i.d insulin resistance diabetes mellitus indicated mean change difference Homeostasis Model Assessment-Insulin Resistance ( HOMA-IR ) , compare placebo group treatment 4 , 8 12 week . - Clinically significant effect YJP-14 three dos , 25 , 50 100 mg t.i.d mean change difference blood pressure diabetes mellitus , compare placebo group treatment 4 , 8 12 week . The exploratory purpose study divide two follow ; - Clinically significant effect YJP-14 three dos , 25 , 50 100 mg t.i.d blood glucose level diabetes mellitus indicate mean change difference HbA1c , compare placebo group treatment 12 week . - Clinically significant effect YJP-14 three dos , 25 , 50 100 mg t.i.d vascular stiffness diabetes mellitus indicated mean change difference blood lipid ( LDL , HDL TG ) , compare placebo group treatment 12 week .
DOC.criteria: Adultonset DM ( define fast glucose great 125 mg/dl ongoing treatment oral hypoglycemic agent ) , Endothelial dysfunction : FMD 6.7 % , LDL cholesterol level le 140 mg/dl , Patients agree Informed Consent Form ( Key exclusion criterion ) Uncontrolled arterial hypertension ( 139/90 mmHg ) hypotension ( 80/50 mmHg ) , Severe diabetic complication : diabetic nephropathy , diabetic neuropathy , diabetic retinopathy , diabetic vascular complication
